name: Thoughtseize
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
flavor: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."
originalText: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

rulings.text: The loss of life is part of the spell’s effect. It’s not an additional cost. If Thoughtseize doesn’t resolve, you won’t lose life.
If you target yourself with this spell, you must reveal your entire hand to the other players just as any other player would.
